post.summary: Reload SIT mode overrides from Google Sheets
post.description: Reloads all SIT mode overrides from Google Sheets API. Use this after adding new entries to the Google Sheet.

get.summary: Get SIT mode status and override summary
get.description: Returns the current status of SIT mode and a summary of loaded overrides

get.summary: Get billing account details by billing account ID
get.description: Retrieve billing account information using the billing account ID directly

400.description: Bad request - Invalid billing account ID

patch.description: Update billing account information using the billing account ID directly

emailPreferred.description: Whether email is preferred contact method

phonePreferred.description: Whether phone is preferred contact method

get.description: List or find Bucket entities

parameters.name: subscriptionType
parameters.description: Can be msisdn, iccid or imsi

get.description: Returns information about the customer API endpoints

post.description: Create a new customer in the system

get.description: Retrieve a customer by their unique identifier
Retrieve billing account information for a customer

patch.description: Update billing account information for a customer

get.description: Search for customers by name, email, orderId, or MSISDN

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term (name, email, orderId, or MSISDN) - minimum 3 characters

400.description: Bad request - Search parameter must be at least 3 characters long

example.message: Search parameter must be at least 3 characters long

post.description: Send an email using the Amdocs communication API

get.description: Fetch eSIM profile status along with the QR code for the provided ICCID resource id.

parameters.name: iccidResourceId
parameters.description: The ICCID resource identifier for the eSIM profile

activationCode.description: Represents a code from which QR-Code can be generated

smdpStatus.description: The status that is received online from a call to SMDP+

get.summary: Gets an ESim Profile Status with SIT Mode Overrides
get.description: Fetch eSIM profile status using SIT mode overrides. If no override exists, returns default "READY TO INSTALL" status.

parameters.name: iccidResourceId
parameters.description: The ICCID resource identifier for the eSIM profile

status.description: Status from SIT mode override or default "READY TO INSTALL"

post.description: Create a new individual in Amdocs Party Management

get.summary: List individuals by resource type and value
get.description: Retrieve individuals by resource type and value, returning individual data for each matched resource ID from the resource API

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Type of resource (e.g., MSISDN, IMSI, etc.)

parameters.name: resourceValue
parameters.description: Value of the resource to search for

billingAccounts.description: Billing accounts associated with the individual

customers.description: Customer accounts associated with the individual

400.description: Bad request - missing required query parameters

404.description: No individuals found for the given resource

get.summary: Get individual by ID with associated data
get.description: Retrieve an individual by their unique identifier along with their products, billing accounts, and associated customers

200.description: Individual found successfully with associated data

billingAccounts.description: Billing accounts associated with the individual

customers.description: Customer accounts associated with the individual

patch.description: Update individual information including personal details, contact information, and address

post.description: Suspend services for an individual by creating a cart and submitting an order

products.description: Optional array of specific product IDs to suspend. If not provided, all active products will be suspended.

effectiveDate.description: Optional effective date for suspension (ISO 8601 format)

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

404.description: Individual not found or no active products

post.description: Resume suspended services for an individual by creating a cart and submitting an order

resumeReason.description: Resume reason code from available resume reasons

products.description: Optional array of specific product IDs to resume. If not provided, all suspended products will be resumed.

effectiveDate.description: Optional effective date for resumption (ISO 8601 format)

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

404.description: Individual not found or no suspended products

post.description: Swap SIM card for an individual by creating a cart and submitting an order. The old SIM will be removed and a new SIM will be added.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Optional channel ID for the SIM swap operation. If not provided, defaults to channel from configuration.

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters, no SIM products found, or multiple SIM products found without specifying msisdn

404.description: Individual not found or no products found

post.description: Replace MSISDN for an individual by creating a cart and submitting an order with replace MSISDN product offering

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Optional channel ID for the replace MSISDN operation. If not provided, defaults to channel from configuration.

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters, no MSISDN products found, or multiple MSISDN products found without specifying msisdn

404.description: Individual not found or no products found

post.description: Terminate all active services for an individual by creating a cart with delete actions and submitting an order

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

404.description: Individual not found or no active products

get.summary: Get all SIM products for individual with status breakdown
get.description: Retrieve all SIM products (ICCID) for an individual with both active and terminated status, grouped by status with counts. Optionally filter by MSISDN.

parameters.name: MSISDN
parameters.description: Optional MSISDN to filter SIM products. If not provided and multiple MSISDN products exist, an error will be returned.

post.summary: Generate Port Out PIN for an individual
post.description: Creates a Port Out PIN generation order for the specified individual. The Port Out PIN will be available in the individual's partyCharacteristic after order processing.

200.description: Port Out PIN generation order created successfully

message.example: Port Out PIN generation order created successfully

portOutPin.description: Port Out PIN details (if available after order processing)

message.example: Failed to generate Port Out PIN

get.summary: Get invoice payment URLs by IDs for multiple invoices
get.description: Retrieve the hosted invoice URLs and payment failure reasons for multiple invoices

400.description: Bad request or invoice not found

get.summary: Get payment failure reason by Payment Intent ID
get.description: Retrieve payment failure reason for a given Payment Intent ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Payment Intent ID to fetch the payment failure reason for

400.description: Bad request or payment intent not found

get.summary: Get AT&T network outage information by ZIP code
get.description: Retrieves wireless network outage information for a specific ZIP code by first determining the state and then fetching outage data from AT&T API

400.description: Bad request - invalid ZIP code format

get.summary: Get next payment details for a billing account
get.description: Retrieves the next payment details including amount, date, and payment method for a specific billing account

status.description: The status of the payment details

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid accountId

get.description: Retrieve orders for a specific customer with pagination support

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for results. Use field names, optionally prefixed with '-' for descending order.
parameters.x-note: Prefix field with '-' for descending order. Example: "-orderDate" for descending, "orderDate" for ascending.

x-result-count.description: Number of orders in current response

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

get.description: Retrieve pending port-in orders for a specific mobile number

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Mobile number (MSISDN) to search for port-in orders

get.description: Check the status of a port by MSISDN

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Mobile number (MSISDN) to check for port status

get.description: Retrieve a specific order by its unique identifier
Retrieve execution status of pending product order items for a specific order

post.description: Cancel an existing order by providing cancellation reason and optional cancellation date

value.message: Bad Request - requestedCancellationDate must be a valid ISO 8601 date

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific decision by its unique identifier

patch.description: Update a decision for an order execution error with choices like retry, abort, or skip

value.message: Bad Request - choice must be one of: @retry, @abort, @skip

get.description: Retrieve payment history for a specific customer

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer ID to get payments for

post.description: Create a new refund intent in System
Resend payment receipts as PDF attachments to the individual's email for payment IDs specified in request body

parameters.name: individualId
parameters.description: Individual ID to resend receipts for

404.description: Individual not found or no valid payment IDs

post.description: Create a new payment intent for processing payments
Create a new payment method for a customer

patch.description: Update an existing payment method. Only specific fields can be updated.

isPreferred.description: Whether this is the preferred payment method

400.description: Bad request - invalid fields or missing required data

get.summary: Get payment method by billing account ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific payment method based on billing Account ID

get.summary: Get payment methods by individual ID
get.description: Retrieve payment methods for a specific individual (related party)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with pagination and sorting support
Retrieve products that are eligible for a specific customer

get.summary: Get base plans and add-on plans
get.description: Retrieve a list of base plans and add-on plans with pagination and sorting support

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term to filter base plans

get.description: Retrieve a list of add-on plans with pagination and sorting support

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term to filter add-on plans

get.description: Retrieve a specific product by its unique identifier
Get a list of refunds for a given account ID

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID to fetch refunds for

get.summary: Get complete RCA analysis for an order
get.description: Performs complete Root Cause Analysis by tracing through all nested executions to find issues, manual interventions, and provides complete workflow details with API call tracking

200.description: Complete RCA analysis with workflow details

get.summary: Get order statistics for a specific date
get.description: Returns order counts by status for a given date. If status parameter is provided, returns order IDs for that status.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status filter. If provided, returns order IDs for that status instead of summary.

get.description: Retrieve resources from Amdocs Resource Inventory with TMF filtering, sorting, and field selection
Retrieve a list of resources available in the system
Retrieve all available resume reasons for service resumption

Check available wireless technologies and service qualification for a given zip code and state using Google Geocoding and AT&T Best Coverage APIs. Returns location coordinates, available technologies, and detailed address information.

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: ZIP code to check service qualification for

200.description: Service qualification information with available technologies and address details

404.description: Location not found - could not extract coordinates

post.description: Check service qualification for a mobile device using its IMEI number

imei.description: IMEI number of the mobile device

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid IMEI

post.description: Create a new setup intent for setting up payment methods

get.summary: Get shopping carts by customer ID
get.description: Retrieve shopping carts for a specific customer with pagination support

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer ID to filter shopping carts

x-result-count.description: Number of shopping carts in current response

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

404.description: No shopping carts found for customer

post.description: Create a new shopping cart for a customer

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

400.description: Bad request - missing request body or channel header

get.description: Retrieve a specific shopping cart by its unique identifier

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID format

patch.description: Update an existing shopping cart with partial data

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID format, missing request body, channel header, or invalid fields

delete.description: Delete a shopping cart by its unique identifier

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID format

post.summary: Add cart item to shopping cart
post.description: Add a new cart item to an existing shopping cart

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID format, missing request body or channel header

patch.summary: Update cart item in shopping cart
patch.description: Update an existing cart item in a shopping cart

schema.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID or cart item ID format, missing request body or channel header

delete.summary: Delete cart item from shopping cart
delete.description: Remove a cart item from a shopping cart

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID or cart item ID format, missing channel header

post.description: Submit a shopping cart to create a new order

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

201.description: Order created successfully from shopping cart

400.description: Bad request - invalid cart ID format or missing channel header

post.summary: Create shopping cart, submit order, and create payment intent
post.description: Creates a shopping cart, submits it to order, and creates a payment intent in a single call

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Required channel id to determine the channel through which the request is initiated

post.description: Create a new payment intent in Stripe for processing payments. Optionally creates a Stripe customer if email and name are provided.

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the payment intent

get.description: Retrieve all available suspension reasons for service suspension
Retrieve all available termination reasons for service termination
Retrieve usage data for a subscription with pagination and sorting support

parameters.name: usageDate.gte
parameters.description: Usage date greater than or equal to

parameters.name: usageDate.lte
parameters.description: Usage date less than or equal to

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order format field.asc or field.desc

400.description: Bad request - missing required parameters or invalid sort/date format

get.description: Check the health status of the API service and all downstream Amdocs services

200.description: Service health status (may be healthy or unhealthy)

500.description: Internal server error during health check
